step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your shoulders and elbows more stable. Focus on opening your fingers wide as instructed.
In step 2, aim for straighter arms overhead and more consistent wrist positioning. Focus on the stretch.
Step 3 shows good progress! Continue to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and tightening your muscles as you make a fist.
For step 4, try to maintain a straighter arm position overhead and keep your wrists more stable as you exhale and relax.
Step 5 is looking good! Keep up the effort to maintain stable shoulders and wrists throughout the movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your arms straighter and your wrists more stable during the overhead stretches. Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades together when making a fist.
